title: 【MineWater】旧闻：alpha已经可以在游戏中正常播放
author: luojiarui
txt_content:
2017-09-02_03.28.31.png (211.27 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2017-9-2 11:41 上传





https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-40275

credits.ogg (Named "Alpha" in C418's Volume Beta) does not play upon viewing the credits after entering the exit portal created by killing the Ender Dragon. The end poem can remain silent through the entire 10 minutes.
On rare occasions the track may play, but plays at the incorrect time and cuts out when the credits finished. I once had it just start to play at the "Twenty years from now..." quote, which is the very end of the poem.



最强bgm已经可以正常播放了
